author: Home Repair Tutor
description:
This video shares how to install DITRA Peel and Stick, also known as DITRA-PS. I recently installed DITRA-PS for a client. So I took the opportunity to outline exactly how it should be done. You'll also see tips for how to remove tile mortar, prime substrates like plywood or concrete, dry-fit the sheets, and more. Many thanks to Schluter for sponsoring this video and providing products for my client's bathroom.

#ditra #schlutersystems #tilefloor #brandpartner 

How to Install DITRA Peel and Stick
0:07 Why tiling over plywood is bad
0:20 How to remove tile mortar
0:46 How to inspect plywood or concrete for tile floors
1:14 How to cut and dry-fit DITRA peel and stick sheets
1:46 How to prime plywood or concrete for DITRA peel and stick
2:37 How to install DITRA peel and stick sheets
3:22 How to activate DITRA peel and stick adhesive
3:36 How to waterproof DITRA peel and stick mats

These supplies were used in my video:

-DITRA Peel and Stick Mats
-DITRA PS Primer
-1/4 inch Nap Paint R
title: How to Install DITRA Peel and Stick
